entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
